analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Sekhassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appattamānasassa anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ patthayamānassa
analyzed: sekhassa bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ appatta mānasassa anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamānassa

original: viharato bāhiraṁ aṅganti karitvā nāññaṁ ekaṅgampi samanupassāmi yaṁ evaṁ bahūpakāraṁ
analyzed: viharataḥ bāhiram aṅga nti karitvā na aññam eka aṅgam pi samanupassāmi yam evam bahu upakāra

original: Kalyāṇamitto, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusalaṁ pajahati, kusalaṁ bhāvetī”ti.
analyzed: kalyāṇa mittaḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu akusalam pajahati kusalam bhāveti iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
